Requirement.ObjectText: [F: PSX_ActDeact] Mode selection strategy of PSC
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Unrecover Interrupt Happen when Recover Interrupt
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Searching Side selection (pPSC/cPSC)
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Searching Side selection (pPSC/cPSC)
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Searching Side selection (pPSC/cPSC)

[F: PSX_ActDeact] Searching Side selection (pPSC/cPSC)
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Parking out Side selection (POC)
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Parking out Side selection (POC)
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Parking out Side selection (POC)
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Maximum Passing Angle
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Acoustic warning for consequence slot

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[APA HMI Tone] Acoustic warning for consequence slot
There shall be Audio Tone triggered each time when new Parking Slot has been offered ? APA_DrRqst shall send “Req_Forward again?at least for the specific duration Time ( Configurable parameter : default value 3 cycles= 100ms x3 )before new Parking Slot is offered (APA_DrRqst= Req_Stop) ? Trigger Condition: New Park slot is found with PosOk&PsOK

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: PSX_ActDeact] Minmum and Maximum Passing Distance
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Parkability slot size
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Road curvature
[F: PSX_ActDeact] neighbouring object angle
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Minimum solt space
[F: PSX_ActDeact] Minimum solt space
[F: PSX_SteerAct] EPS Handshaking
[F: PSX_FinalWheelPos] Steering wheel straightening
[F: PSX_Perf] Park-In Parallel Parking Missed slot rate
[F: PSX_Perf] Park-In Perpendicular Parking Missed slot rate
[F: POC_Perf] Failed Park-Out rate
[F: POC_Perf] Park in and Park out - Slope inclination
[F: POC_Perf] Max curb hit perfomance
Process Bar Display
Process Bar Display
Process Bar Display
Valid short APA Button Press timing

[APA Button Press filter time]
In order to avoid unintended very quick Button press recognition, HW Button shall be considered as pressed only when the pressing state is detected continuously longer than defined Button press filter time
PS: Button press filter time shall be larger than the Button CAN signal cycle time (100ms) and shorter than driver minimum short presssing time (normally<150ms from test experience)

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[APA Button Press filter time]
In order to avoid unintended very quick Button press recognition, HW Button shall be considered as pressed only when the pressing state is detected continuously longer than defined Button press filter time <P_BtnPress_FilterTime: default: 120ms>
PS: Button press filter time shall be larger than the Button CAN signal cycle time (100ms) and shorter than driver minimum short presssing time (normally<150ms from test experience)

Requirement.ObjectText: APA Quit for APA Button Long Press Timeout

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[APA Quit for APA Button Long Press Timeout]
If APA Button is pressed longer than 15s after APA HMI requests" APA button Long press 2s", APA shall Quit as "Function Off".
Note: if confirmation condition is not met after APA request APA Button Press, APA shall quite when APA Button is pressed longer than 15s

Requirement.ObjectText: Valid Long APA Button Press timing

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[APA Valid Long Button Press Time]
? Calibratable Parameter: ? <P_APA_BtnPress_Tmin> = 2s -> 1s
Note: There is no APA button release request in FAW APA HMI. Driver long button press may be slightly shorter than 2s. Reduce this timing parameter to avoid unnesessary APA quite. (APA HMI request still 2s long press.)

Requirement.ObjectText: Process Bar Display
LED status during Parkmaneuver Default
Requirement.CustAttr4:
Bui Dai Tri_21_10_2019: Change from 2s to 1s as propose from Wenjie.
Bui Dai Tri_21_10_2019: Closed Bui Dai Tri_15_07_2020 Rejected this RQ as customer request.

Requirement.ObjectText: LED On/Off condition

[F: PSX] Background searching: During Background searching all sensor will firing. And APA shall be able to search Park Slot on both side during APA standby when the speed is within the Seraching Speed Threshold.

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
APA Background Searching
APA shall be able to search Park Slot on both side during APA standby when the speed is within the Seraching Speed Threshold.

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: PSX] Background searching idle: During Background searching idle , all sensor will firing.

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
APA Background Searching
APA shall be able to search Park Slot on both side during APA standby when the speed is within the Seraching Speed Threshold.

Requirement.ObjectText: 1. APA Camera System Status (AVS) shall not be monitored by APA ECU 2. APA Handshaking shall be allowed at any gear position 3. APA guidance can be entered by a valid APA button long press
Virtual wall and Sway move features for POC can be switch On and Off by parameter switch defined in DCM.

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText: Virtual Wall and Sway Move features for POC can be switch On and Off by parameter switch defined in DCM. D357: On D365/D359: Off

Requirement.ObjectText: During Hank Shaking phase if the master cylinder pressure below defined parameter P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold, then APA will go back to Driver Confirm and HMI will display “Request Brake? until it's value is larger than P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold.

If brake pedal is not pressed before the handshaking is established, then APA shall not abort. APA SM state shall go back to "Drive_Confirm".
Note: Abort for NOK ESP and EPS status during “Driver Confirm" are ignored.

If APA needs to abort handshaking with EPS before the handshaking is established, APA shall send "APA_EPS_Control_Request = 0x2 Control Active" continously for 3 cycles before sending No Request. (to avoid EPS error status)
Customer Requirement: https://inside-share-hosted-apps.bosch.com/DMS/GetDocumentService/Document.svc/GetDocumentURL?documentID=P01S064054-2114853619-1593
[F: APA_HMI] System Disable
[F: APA_HMI] System Waitting for engine When signal EngineSt = Off, EngineSt_ISS = Intervention, press valid buttone the hmi should as below.
[F: APA_HMI] System Standby

[F: APA_HMI] System Back ground searching Condition for APA enter the background searching: 1. If the internal or external failure is not presence. 2 Speed is below 25km/h. 3 Vehicle direction is not Backward. 4 Gear not Reverse or not Park
[F: APA_HMI] System Back ground searching During the background searching, if the gear Reverse or Park is engaged or vehicle direction is Backward then APA will enter back ground search idle.

[F: APA_HMI] System Back ground searching The APA Drv_Rqst signal does not send the value “Req_Gear_D? or "Req_SearchingProcess", if below preconditions are fulfill: - Psc/ppsc is selected by the driver via HMI - Parking slot is found during background searching then - Driver active APA via press button
[F: APA_HMI] Select Park Type and Park Mode
[F: APA_HMI] Insert D for Parking in searching
[F: APA_HMI] Request driver forward in pPSC and right side

[F: APA_HMI] Check vehicle speed during searching Speed condition check is valid after parking type Cpsc/Ppsc is selected. During seaching , if 25km/h= signal VehicleSpeed <30km/h, the HMI will display warning for driver. The Gear condition request shall have high priority than the speed slow down request. If the APA is in searching mode and the gear is not in D gear, APA shall keep requesting "insert D gear" when the speed >25kmh
[F: APA_HMI] Request driver to find the parking slot again If the parking slot is found but vehicle position is not ok the the APA will send the following message.
[F: APA_HMI] Request to standstill vehicle in pPSC
[F: APA_HMI] Select parking side for POC

[F: APA_HMI] Check safety condition: any door openning System shall check all doors after parking slot found and before entering Guidance. Driver request shall be sent to HMI in case of any condition is not fullfilled.

[F: APA_HMI] Check safety condition: Trunk or luggage door openning System shall check all safety condition after parking slot found and before entering Guidance. Driver request shall be sent to HMI in case of any condition is not fullfilled.

[F: APA_HMI] Check safety condition: Seat Belt does not fasten System shall check safety condition after slot found and before entering Guidance. Driver request shall be sent to HMI in case of any condition is not fullfilled.
[F: APA_HMI] Check safety condition: Driver Request Priority during safety checking condition.

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the PAS ECU fail occures during searching.
PAS ECU failure: Sensor/ROM/RAM/NVM/Watchdog
Requirement.CustAttr4:
Wenjie_22_10_2019 if can signal failure happens then the Pas_failure should not trigger.
01_Sep_2020_blo1hc: No finding

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the speed overflow condition occures during searching.
Speed Overflow: signal VehicleSpeed > 30 km/h

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park In If vehicle speed is more than 25km/h and driver active APA via press button then APA will go to OFF state.
Speed Overflow: signal VehicleSpeed > 25 km/h

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if APA button press before enterring guidance:
Input signal: APA_ButtonSt = 0x1:Press

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if gear box status is not fault during searching:
Abort condition: GearboxSt = 0x1: Fault TriBui 7_4_2020 Rejected this RQ following change request from customer

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if APAConfirmi status is fault before enterring Guidance.
Abort condition: APAConfirm= 0x2: Terminated
[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park In If the Dead Man Switch is pressed longer than 15s during Press dead man switch phase, APA shall quit and back to Function Off.

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the EPS failure occures during searching: Tri Bui_30_1_2020 Note: This requirement is applicable after the APA button is pressed and parking type and parking mode is identified. and the APA will abort condition The same behaviour with D058
EPS Off condition: EPS_APA_Abortfeedback is equal to:
0x1 Vehicle Speed invalid or timeout 0x2 Hands on detection 0x3 SteeringAngle exceeds SteeringWheel Angle limits 0x4 SteeringAngle speed exceeds Steering Angle speed limits 0x5 SteeringWheelAngle Invalid 0x6 APA control signal invalid or timeout 0x7 CAN Bus Off 0x8 Vehicle Speed invalid or timeout 0x9 EPS internal failure with limited steering assistance 0xA Gear signal invalid or timeout 0xB Request EPS Control received when in control 0xD Difference of SteeringAngle Req and SteeringWheel angle exceeds limit 0xE Vehilce speed exceeds limits when in control 0xF EPS system critical failure, no steering assistance 0x10 EPS control active received without handshaking 0x11 Hand shaking time out

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the following condition occures during searching:
Parking out Space limitation Input signal: internal SW component front sensor couldn't detect the object.(The object distance was 1.5 m)

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the following condition occures during searching.
External ECU failure: CAN Bus off or Lost communication with CAN Node(Except PAS) or Related CAN Node signal Invalid/Button/LED/Power

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the PAS ECU fail occures during searching.
PAS ECU failure: Sensor/ROM/RAM/NVM/Watchdog

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if APA button press before enterring guidance.
Input signal: APA_ButtonSt = 0x1
[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park Out When Vehicle is not in standstill , driver select POC function, PAC ECU shall remind driver that vehicle speed was too high and APA function will quit.

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if APAConfirmi status is not fault before enterring Guidance.
Abort condition: APAConfirm= 0x2: Terminated

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if gear box status is not fault during searching:
Abort condition: GearboxSt = 0x1: Fault
TriBui 7_4_2020 Rejected this RQ following change request from customer
[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park out If the Dead Man Switch is pressed longer than 15s during Press dead man switch phase, APA shall quit and back to Function Off.

[F: APA_HMI]Searching Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the EPS failure occures during guidance: Tri Bui_30_1_2020 Note: This requirement is applicable after the APA button is pressed and parking type and parking mode is identified. and the APA will abort condition The same behaviour with D058
EPS Off condition: EPS_APA_Abortfeedback is equal to:
0x1 Vehicle Speed invalid or timeout 0x3 SteeringAngle exceeds SteeringWheel Angle limits 0x4 SteeringAngle speed exceeds Steering Angle speed limits 0x5 SteeringWheelAngle Invalid 0x6 APA control signal invalid or timeout 0x7 CAN Bus Off 0x8 Vehicle Speed invalid or timeout 0x9 EPS internal failure with limited steering assistance 0xA Gear signal invalid or timeout 0xB Request EPS Control received when in control 0xD Difference of SteeringAngle Req and SteeringWheel angle exceeds limit 0xE Vehilce speed exceeds limits when in control 0xF EPS system critical failure, no steering assistance 0x10 EPS control active received without handshaking 0x11 Hand shaking time out

[F: APA_HMI] Disclaimer Confirmation during Guidance - Park In If Park slot is found during searching, brake requirement is not fullfill (BrakePedalSt =! 0x1: Actuated) APA will send the below request to driver. Change Request: BRU1HC 18_1_2020 Addition condition for Req_Press Brake Pedal; if the master cylinder pressure below defined parameter P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold, then HMI will display “Request Brake?, until it's value is larger than P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold

[F: APA_HMI] Disclaimer Confirmation during Guidance - Park Out If Park slot is found during searching, brake requirement is not fullfill (BrakePedalSt =! 0x1: Actuated) APA will send the below request to driver. Change Request: BRU1HC 18_1_2020 Addition condition for Req_Press Brake Pedal; if the master cylinder pressure below defined parameter P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold, then HMI will display “Request Brake?, until it's value is larger than P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold

[F: APA_HMI] Guidance Confirmation- Park In During searching confirmation, if brake and gear condition are met (BrakePedalSt = 0x1: Actuated ), APA will request driver to press dead man switch. Change Request: BRU1HC 18_1_2020 Addition condition for Req_Press Brake Pedal; if the master cylinder pressure below defined parameter P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold, then HMI will display “Request Brake?, until it's value is larger than P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold

[F: APA_HMI] Guidance Confirmation- Park Out During guidance confirmation, if brake and gear condition are met (BrakePedalSt = 0x1: Actuated ), APA will request driver to press dead man switch. Change Request: BRU1HC 18_1_2020 Addition condition for Req_Press Brake Pedal; if the master cylinder pressure below defined parameter P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold, then HMI will display “Request Brake?, until it's value is larger than P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold
[F: APA_HMI]Enter Guidance- Park In During guidance, if the brake is pressed (BrakePedalSt = 0x1: Actuated), APA will request driver to release the brake.
[F: APA_HMI]In Guidance- Park In During guidance, The HMI signals will have the following value.
[F: APA_HMI]In Guidance- Park Out During guidance, The HMI signals will have the following value.
[F: APA_HMI] Guidance completed- Park In During guidance, The HMI signals will have the following value.
[F: APA_HMI] Guidance Completed- Park Out During guidance, The HMI signals will have the following value.

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Interrupt During guidance, if the door opens (Except Driver Door) the APA will enter the interrupt. Interrup condition: (DoorSt_FR= 0x1 Open, DoorSt_RR= 0x1 Open, DoorSt_RL= 0x1 Open),
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Interrupt If the Interrupt condition recovers, then the APA will sent the flollowing message to hmi.
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Interrupt Object on Path If obstacle is removed before OOC Timeout, APA shall be able to resume guidance.

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText: [Obstacle On Path - Resume] - If obstacle is removed before OOC Timeout, APA shall be able to resume guidance.

[Obstacle On Path - HMI Display Strategy] - If Vehicle is brought to standstill due to unexpected objects found on Path, APA HMI shall display “Found Obstacle in Trajectory? . - If Vehicle starts to move again from standstill, HMI shall not display “Found Obstacle in Trajectory??

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Interrupt Object on Path
- Avoid SWA Change During OOC] ? APG Mode remain On during OOC ? Keep the previous SWA Request in SM when OOC occurs.

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[Obstacle On Path - Avoid SWA Change During OOC] ? APG Mode remain On during OOC ? Keep the previous SWA Request in SM when OOC occurs.
Note : Parameter: SWA Deviation between Request and Actual: 250°

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance.
External ECU failure: CAN Bus off or Lost communication with CAN Node(Except PAS) or Related CAN Node signal Invalid/Button/LED/Power

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the PAS ECU fail occures during guidance.
PAS ECU failure: Sensor/ROM/RAM/NVM/Watchdog

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the speed overflow condition occures during guidance.
Speed Overflow: signal VehicleSpeed > 7 km/h

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the speed overflow condition occures during guidance.
Movement abort condition: Number of movement is > 7 times for pPSC or 9 times for cPSC

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if Shift selector can not achieve target gear in 2s during guidance.
Shift selector can not achieve target gear in 2s: APA_LCFailureSt == 0x5: Unexpected_GearIntervention

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance:
EPB lock vehicle Input signal: APA_LCFailureSt == 0x3: Unexpected_EPB_Action

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance:
Driver Door/Luggage door Open: DoorSt_FL= 0x1 Open, LuggageDoorStatus_PLG= 0x1 Open)

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if gas pedal valid input during guidance: Gas pedal input condition: APA will exit if the Gas pedal value is over 3% of range. can refer based gen 5 project for the range
Requirement.CustAttr4:
Wenjie_22_10_2019 3% of range. Closed
01_Sep_2020_blo1hc: No finding

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if there is Emergency Brake
Requirement.CustAttr4: Wenjie_22_10_2019 Recheck this requirement about the abort condition ?? [Wenjie] As we discussed,? this condition is only valid for PSC PEB function.? It does not apply to APA function. So rejected this requirment.

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if the gear level is hands on during guidance:
Hands on gear level: APA_LCFailureSt == 0x2: Unexpected_GearPosition

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if Path Tracking Error occures during guidance:
Path Tracking Error: internal SW component

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[APG Abort Reason Mapping to HMI Display]
APG Abort ? HMI PAS_Failure 1 "AbortInternalError_enm"??? Pas_Failure
APG Abort ? HMI External Failure 21 "AbortMaxSWADevExceeded_enm"? External Failure 25 "AbortPSSideAndTypeMonitorError_enm" ? External Failure 26 "AbortSCMFalselyIncrementedMoveNum_enm"? ? External Failure 27 "AbortSCMDangerousSteeringIntoOppDir_enm" ? External Failure 28 "AbortSCMSWAKappaSignError_enm"? ? External Failure 29 "AbortSteeringAngleRequestMonitor_enm"? ? External Failure
APG Abort ? HMI Max. Move Reached 3 "AbortMaxNumOfMovesReached_enm"? ? Max. Move reached
APG Abort ? HMI Speed Too High 11 "AbortVelocityTooHigh_enm" ? Speed too High
APG Abort ? Trajectory Issue 4 “AbortExternalDeactivation_enm?? ? Trajectory Issue 5 "AbortReactivationImpossible_enm"? ? Trajectory Issue 12 "AbortUncontrolledTravelDistReached_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 10 "AbortNoValidPathFound_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 20 "AbortOffTrack_enm"? Trajectory Issue 22 "AbortOutsideOfSuboptimalTPRange_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 23 "AbortMaxYawAngleReached_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 24 "AbortMaxExtensionOLOReference_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 30 "AbortMoveTooShortForLongCtrl_enm" ? Trajectory Issue
APG Abort ? Space Limit 14 "AbortFullwarningOnBothSides_enm"? ? Space Limit 15 "AbortPSTooSmall_enm"? ? Space Limit
APG Abort ? Function Off (OOC Abort) 13 "AbortObstacleOnPath_enm" ? Function Off ?after OOC Display Timeout (30s) 1 "AbortPathBlockedInsidePS_enm"?? ? Function Off? ? 5s is changed to 30s
== Others === 7 "AbortDegradationByFIM_enm"? ? Decided by FIM Fault symptom (External Failure / Pas_Failure) 2 "AbortWrontInputData_enm"??? Not Used

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if Rolling Direction Violation occures during guidance:
Rolling Direction Violation Condition: The current Car moving direction does not match the gear position for 800ms.

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance:
Space limitation condition: internal SW component(space is not enough to parking in or parking out Condition: Can set the PSL values in simulation for this test case
Requirement.CustAttr4:
Bui Tien Loi_22_10_2019 Add the abort condition for this RQ Closed
01_Sep_2020_blo1hc: No finding

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if interrupt times during APA guidance is fulfill 8 times.

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if the EPS failure occures during guidance:
EPS Off condition: EPS_APA_Abortfeedback is equal to:
0x1 Vehicle Speed invalid or timeout 0x3 SteeringAngle exceeds SteeringWheel Angle limits 0x4 SteeringAngle speed exceeds Steering Angle speed limits 0x5 SteeringWheelAngle Invalid 0x6 APA control signal invalid or timeout 0x7 CAN Bus Off 0x8 Vehicle Speed invalid or timeout 0x9 EPS internal failure with limited steering assistance 0xA Gear signal invalid or timeout 0xB Request EPS Control received when in control 0xD Difference of SteeringAngle Req and SteeringWheel angle exceeds limit 0xE Vehilce speed exceeds limits when in control 0xF EPS system critical failure, no steering assistance 0x10 EPS control active received without handshaking 0x11 Hand shaking time out

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In If there is Intervention , PSC system should be not Active or aborted. Condition: ((0x1 == Intervention_ABS) || (0x1 == Intervention_TCS) ||? (0x1 == Intervention_ESP)||(0x1 == Intervention_HBB)) ??? && ((0x0 == ErrorSt_ABS) &&? (0x0 == ErrorSt_EBD) && (0x0 == ErrorSt_ESP)&& ((0x3 == WorkingSt_HBB) || (0x0 == WorkingSt_HBB))))

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In If there is Intervention , PSC system should be not Active or aborted. Condition: (0x1 == ErrorSt_ABS)||(0x1 == ErrorSt_EBD)||(0x1 == ErrorSt_ESP)||((0x3 != WorkingSt_HBB) && (0x0 != WorkingSt_HBB)))
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In If there is steering wheel error happens during guidance, PSC system should be aborted. Condition: EPS_APAStatus= 0x1: Error

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if seat belt is unlock ed during guidance:
Input signal: SeatBeltSt_Driver= 0x0: unbuckle

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if steering wheel is hand on during guidance:
Input signal: EPS_APAAbortFeedback= 0x2: Hands on detection
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if internal SW condition is not fullfill. Condition: APA_LCFailureSt = 0x01: Vehicle_blocked
Requirement.CustAttr4:
Wenjie_22_10_2019 Add abort condition to this RQ Closed
01_Sep_2020_blo1hc: No finding

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if APAConfirmi status is not fault during Guidance.
Abort condition: APAConfirm= 0x2: Terminated
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In When receiving APA_Button_St = 0x1 Pressed during Guidance active, APA shall quit and back to Function Off.

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In If HMI distance < P_OOC_Abort_Distance_Min for delay timeout (should add new parameter), APA will Abort.
P_OOC_Abort_Distance_Min = 15cm Delay_timeout = 5s

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText: [Obstacle On Path - OOC abort due to too close obstacle] HMI distance < P_OOC_Abort_Distance_Min (default :15cm) for delay timeout (default;5s), APA will Abort

External ECU failure: CAN Bus off or Lost communication with CAN Node(Except PAS) or Related CAN Node signal Invalid/Button/LED/Power

PAS ECU failure: Sensor/ROM/RAM/NVM/Watchdog

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the speed overflow condition occures during guidance.
Speed Overflow: signal VehicleSpeed > 7 km/h

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if Shift selector can not achieve target gear in 2s during guidance.
Shift selector can not achieve target gear in 2s: APA_LCFailureSt == 0x5: Unexpected_GearIntervention

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The guidance shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance:
EPB lock vehicle Input signal: APA_LCFailureSt == 0x3: Unexpected_EPB_Action

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The guidance shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance:
Driver Door/Luggage Door Open: DoorSt_FL= 0x1 Open, LuggageDoorStatus_PLG= 0x1 Open)

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the speed overflow condition occures during guidance.
Movement abort condition: Number of movement is 15 times

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The guidance shall be exited if gas pedal valid input during guidance: Gas pedal input condition: APA will exit if the Gas pedal value is over 3% of range. can refer based gen 5 project for the range

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The APA function shall be exited if APAConfirmi status is not fault during Guidance.
Abort condition: APAConfirm= 0x2: Terminated

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The guidance shall be exited if the gear level is hands on during guidance:
Hands on gear level: APA_LCFailureSt == 0x2: Unexpected_GearPosition

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if Path Tracking Error occures during guidance:
Path Tracking Error: internal SW component or

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if Rolling Direction Violation occures during guidance:
Rolling Direction Violation Condition: The current Car moving direction does not match the gear position for 800ms.

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance:
Space limitation condition: internal SW component(space is not enough parking out Condition: Can set the PSL values in simulation for this test case

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[APG Abort Reason Mapping to HMI Display]
APG Abort ? HMI PAS_Failure 1 "AbortInternalError_enm"??? Pas_Failure
APG Abort ? HMI External Failure 21 "AbortMaxSWADevExceeded_enm"? External Failure 25 "AbortPSSideAndTypeMonitorError_enm" ? External Failure 26 "AbortSCMFalselyIncrementedMoveNum_enm"? ? External Failure 27 "AbortSCMDangerousSteeringIntoOppDir_enm" ? External Failure 28 "AbortSCMSWAKappaSignError_enm"? ? External Failure 29 "AbortSteeringAngleRequestMonitor_enm"? ? External Failure
APG Abort ? HMI Max. Move Reached 3 "AbortMaxNumOfMovesReached_enm"? ? Max. Move reached
APG Abort ? HMI Speed Too High 11 "AbortVelocityTooHigh_enm" ? Speed too High
APG Abort ? Trajectory Issue 4 “AbortExternalDeactivation_enm?? ? Trajectory Issue 5 "AbortReactivationImpossible_enm"? ? Trajectory Issue 12 "AbortUncontrolledTravelDistReached_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 10 "AbortNoValidPathFound_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 20 "AbortOffTrack_enm"? Trajectory Issue 22 "AbortOutsideOfSuboptimalTPRange_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 23 "AbortMaxYawAngleReached_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 24 "AbortMaxExtensionOLOReference_enm" ? Trajectory Issue 30 "AbortMoveTooShortForLongCtrl_enm" ? Trajectory Issue
APG Abort ? Space Limit 14 "AbortFullwarningOnBothSides_enm"? ? Space Limit 15 "AbortPSTooSmall_enm"? ? Space Limit
APG Abort ? Function Off (OOC Abort) 13 "AbortObstacleOnPath_enm" ? Function Off ?after OOC Display Timeout (30s) 1 "AbortPathBlockedInsidePS_enm"?? ? Function Off? ? 5s is changed to 30s
== Others === 7 "AbortDegradationByFIM_enm"? ? Decided by FIM Fault symptom (External Failure / Pas_Failure) 2 "AbortWrontInputData_enm"??? Not Used

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance: priority Level 18. Recover Number Overflow Error: internal SW component
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the following condition occures during guidance: priority Level 21. ESP Off condition: WorkingSt_ESP = 0x0: Off;

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if the EPS failure occures during guidance: priority Level 21. EPS Off condition: EPS_APA_Abortfeedback is equal to:
0x1 Vehicle Speed invalid or timeout 0x3 SteeringAngle exceeds SteeringWheel Angle limits 0x4 SteeringAngle speed exceeds Steering Angle speed limits 0x5 SteeringWheelAngle Invalid 0x6 APA control signal invalid or timeout 0x7 CAN Bus Off 0x8 Vehicle Speed invalid or timeout 0x9 EPS internal failure with limited steering assistance 0xA Gear signal invalid or timeout 0xB Request EPS Control received when in control 0xD Difference of SteeringAngle Req and SteeringWheel angle exceeds limit 0xE Vehilce speed exceeds limits when in control 0xF EPS system critical failure, no steering assistance 0x10 EPS control active received without handshaking 0x11 Hand shaking time out

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out If there is Intervention , POC system should be not Active or aborted. Condition: ((0x1 == Intervention_ABS) || (0x1 == Intervention_TCS) ||? (0x1 == Intervention_ESP)||(0x1 == Intervention_HBB)) ??? && ((0x0 == ErrorSt_ABS) &&? (0x0 == ErrorSt_EBD) && (0x0 == ErrorSt_ESP)&& ((0x3 == WorkingSt_HBB) || (0x0 == WorkingSt_HBB))))

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out If there is Intervention , POC system should be not Active or aborted. Condition: ((0x1 == ErrorSt_ABS)||(0x1 == ErrorSt_EBD)||(0x1 == ErrorSt_ESP)||((0x3 != WorkingSt_HBB) && (0x0 != WorkingSt_HBB)))
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The guidance shall be exited if seat belt is unlock ed during guidance: Input signal: SeatBeltSt_Driver= 0x0: unbuckle
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The guidance shall be exited if the internal sw condition is not fullfill during guidance:
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The guidance shall be exited if steering wheel is hand on during guidance: Input signal: EPS_APAAbortFeedback= 0x2: Hands on detection

[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out The APA function shall be exited if APAConfirmi status is not fault during Guidance.
Abort condition: APAConfirm= 0x2: Terminated
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park Out APA shall quit and back to Function Off. If the Dead Man Switch is pressed longer than 15s during: 1 . Recover hold phase phase 2. Press dead man switch
[F: APA_HMI] Guidance Abort - Park Out When receiving APA_Button_St = 0x1 Pressed during Guidance active, APA shall quit and back to Function Off.
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In The guidance shall be exited if there is Emergency Brake
Requirement.CustAttr4: Wenjie_25_10_2019 Recheck abort condition. ?? [Wenjie] As we discussed,? this condition is only valid for PSC PEB function.? It does not apply to APA function. So rejected this requirment.

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI]Guidance Abort - Park In If HMI distance < P_OOC_Abort_Distance_Min for delay timeout (should add new parameter), APA will Abort.
P_OOC_Abort_Distance_Min = 15cm Delay_timeout = 5s

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText: [Obstacle On Path - OOC abort due to too close obstacle] HMI distance < P_OOC_Abort_Distance_Min (default :15cm) for delay timeout (default;5s), APA will Abort

Requirement.ObjectText:
[F: APA_HMI] Time out abort APA will abort searching if the following conditions are met: 1. If the duration from APA activation to enterring guidance is longer thang 4 minutes,
APA will abort guidance if the following conditions are met: 1. If the guidance process( includes recoverable interrupts) is longer than 4 minutes. 2. Wait for Driver to close all passenger Doors (except driver door & Trunk) during recoverable abort

[F: APA_HMI] Time out abort APA will abort searching if the following conditions are met:
1. If the duration waiting for the driver to press Deadman Switch for confirmationt is longer than 30s 2. If the phase Park Mode (pPSC/cPSC/PO) Selection (APA_DrRqst = 0xA: Req_Function Select) is longer than 30s.
Requirement.CustAttr4:
it is difference with the D058: APA_DrRqst=0xB: Req_Function off;
01_Sep_2020_blo1hc: No finding

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA_HMI] Time out abort APA will abort guidance if guidacne is suspended due to "Obstacle on Path" and the obstacles are not removed and kept blocking the path longer than 30s.

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText: [Obstacle On Path - Timeout] - If obstacle are not removed and keeps blocking the blocking the path, APA shall keep display in “Found Obstacle in Trajectory? and exits as "Function Off" after OOC Timeout o [OOC Timeout Parameter] ? default value 30s.

APA will abort guidance if the following conditions are met: 1. If the guidance process( includes recoverable interrupts) is longer than 4 minutes. 2. Wait for Driver to close all passenger Doors (except driver door & Trunk) during recoverable abort

1. If the duration waiting for the driver to press Deadman Switch for confirmationt is longer than 30s 2. If the phase Park Mode (pPSC/cPSC/PO) Selection (APA_DrRqst = 0xA: Req_Function Select) is longer than 30s.

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA_HMI]ESP or EPS hand shaking time out abort ESP hand shake time out is 500ms. EPS hand shake time out is 500ms.
[F: APA_HMI] When APA is activated via APA button and ESP Status are not correct, APA shall not request Parking Mode select and shall quit as
[F: APA_HMI] Temperatory HMI Display Duration

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText: Updated 2020/5/7

[APA Failure Display] If APA is activated and degradtion condition is present, then APA shall go to Failure Statue for "Temperatory HMI Display Duration" (3s) and then change back to standby.
If APA is in standby and degradation condition is met, then APA shall remain in IDLE/Standby.

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA_ActDeact] APA Button Long Press A Valid APA Button Long Press shall be considered if the APA button is pressed longer than <P_APA_BtnPress_Tmin> and then released shorter than <P_APA_BtnPress_Tmax>
[F: APA_ActDeact] Sensor self test time. When the Engine Status changes from any other value to 0x2 Running, Voltage related failure shall be suppressed for 1s (configurable parameter).

[F: APA_ActDeact] Waiting after start stop time. When the engine is restarted to Runing state (Engine Running & STT Closed), APA_DrRqst shall change from 0x0: No Request to 0x2: Req_Function Select after 500ms.

[F: APA_Search] Searching Slow Down Warning
If the speed >=25kmh during searching phase, Speed Slow Down shall be sent to HMI.

[F: APA_Search] Master Cylinder Pressure during Searching.
P_MasterCylinderPressure_Threshold
[F: APA_Guidance] APA Guidance Abort Speed Limit- Speed Overflow APA shall abort the guidance if the acutual vehicle speed is larger than this threshold.
[F: APA_Guidance] Max. Suspension times allowed during APA guidance

[F: APA_Guidance] Time out Park Mode (pPSC/cPSC/PO) Selection - Wait for the driver to press Deadman Switch for confirmation - Wait for Driver to close all passenger Doors (except driver door & Trunk) during recoverable abort
[F: APA_Search]Max. Suspension times - Steps Overflow Max.parking moves allower during APA guidance
[F: APA_Guidance] EPS Handshaking Timeout

[F: APA_Guidance] Obstacle On Path Avoid too short OOC display Freeze the OOC display if the LocbrakeReason is reset from “Unexpect_OOC? to “OOC? while the vehicle is still in standstill. Avoid unintended OOC Display Set the UnexpectOoc_filter_time for unexpected OOC (Default: 1s)

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[Obstacle On Path - Avoid OOC Display duration too short] ? #1 avoid too short OOC display ? Freeze the OOC display if the LocbrakeReason is reset from “Unexpect_OOC? to “OOC? while the vehicle is still in standstill.
#2 :? ? avoid unintended OOC Display ? Set the UnexpectOoc_filter_time for unexpected OOC (Default: 1s) Defect 157602: cPSC+80cm, HMI indicated obstacle on path then disappeared

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA_Guidance] Obstacle On Path Add : ?LocbrakeReason= OocObject? + Delay Time +Correct Direction (obstacles are not considered as unexpected OOC) OocObj Rear /Front Moving Direction Rear / Front No Further movement (rbp_apgGuide_st.Mgmt_st.PSBlockedByInnerObstacle_b) + Vehicle Standstill after OOC_Filter_Time (Default: 5s ) Related parameter : APG_CPSC_BI_ImmersionThreshForPSBlockerObject If the vehicle starts to move again, then OOC shall not be displayed.

LinkedRequirement.ObjectText:
[Obstacle On Path - Avoid No OOC Display] ? Keep the current “unexpectedOoc?? ? ? Add : ?LocbrakeReason= OocObject? + Delay Time +Correct Direction (obstacles are not considered as unexpected OOC) ? OocObj Rear /Front ? Moving Direction Rear / Front ? No Further movement (rbp_apgGuide_st.Mgmt_st.PSBlockedByInnerObstacle_b) + Vehicle Standstill after OOC_Filter_Time (Default: 5s ) o Related parameter : APG_CPSC_BI_ImmersionThreshForPSBlockerObject
If the vehicle starts to move again, then OOC shall not be displayed.

[F: APA FailAct] APA_Status signal is Standby value and keep the same value if the internal or external failure happens.
During failure presence ( internal or external ) if APA button is press then APASt will change to Failure for 3s then back to Standby.
[F: APA FailReact] In case of APA related failure is detected (during normal system operation), APA LED turns off.
[F: APA FailReact] If APA Push Button is pressed while failure is present, APA LED turns on for 3 seconds, then it is turned off.
[F: APA FailReact] The APA system shall output APA Parking Distance (StopDistance) with Default Value (0cm) during APA Failure activation stages.
[F: APA FailReact] The APA system shall output APA Brake Function ID (BrakeFunctionMode) with Default Value (No Action) during APA Failure activation stages.
Requirement.CustAttr4: TRU2HC_11_11_2019 No findings BRUHC_18_05_2020 Reject this requirement due to duplicated with AUTO_1763.

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA FailReact] The APA system shall output APA Working Status (APABrakeModeSt) with Abort when failure happens. Note: When APASt Standby, press APA button Failure will lead to Idle state and APABrakeModeSt will keep Standby
Requirement.CustAttr4:
TRU2HC_11_11_2019 APA Working Status should keep the last value if the APA did not active.
01_Sep_2020_blo1hc: No finding

Requirement.ObjectText:
[APA Abort Request Duration] when APA requests Abort during handshaking and guidance, APA shall send abort request to ESP for 3s.
APA Abort Request TargetGearRequest_PSC=0x1: Target Gear P ?APA_BrakeModeSt=0x5: Abort FailureBrakeMode=0x2: Emergency
[F: APA FailReact] The APA system shall output APA Speed Limit (SpeedLimitation) with Default Value (0km/h) during APA Failure activation stages.
[F: APA FailReact] The APA system shall output APA Target Gear Request (TargetGearRequest_PSC) with Default Value ( No Request) during APA Failure activation stages.
Requirement.CustAttr4:
TRU2HC_11_11_2019 Should be considered guidance and searching phase.
01_Sep_2020_blo1hc: No finding

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA FailReact] The APA system shall keep APA Failure Brake Mode (FailureBrakeMode) with Last Value during APA Failure activation stages.
Requirement.CustAttr4:
TRU2HC_11_11_2019 Should be considered guidance and searching phase.
01_Sep_2020_blo1hc: No finding

Requirement.ObjectText: [F: APA FailReact] The APA system shall output EPS Control Request (EPSControlRequest) with Default Value (No Request) during APA Failure activation stages.

[F: APA FailReact] The APA system shall output APA Target Steering Wheel Angle Request (SteeringWAngleReq_APA) equal to actual steering angel from Steering Wheel Angle during APA Failure activation stages.
